main

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno This Logger is a Singleton and can output logging data to Console, Files (auto-assigned) or a visual MessageBox. The logger automatically closes all Files when being destroyed!

        private boolean assignFile()
        Assigns a LogFile. In Case of an Error there is a Console-Fallback
        Returns:

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Close all Files when shutting down! (Do not let open handles back in FileSystem/OS)
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
